author: dkulp
msg: Cache the JAXBDataBinding class which make client creation a tiny bit faster (after the first one) and can hopefully fix a potential deadlock issue when using spring-dm to start multiple bundles that have jaxws:client entries.

author: chirino
msg: Fixes issue identified in APLO-245 where index does not seem to get cleaned up / compacted.  Fix ported over from Apollo.

author: chirino
msg: Suspend/Resume index compactions instead of closing out the index.

author: chirino
msg: Fixes bug identified in APLO-284.  Ported fix over from Apollo.
